text: Tokyo Olympics may refer to: * 1940 Summer Olympics, moved to Helsinki first, then cancelled due to World War II * 1964 Summer Olympics, games of the XVIII Olympiad * 2020 Summer Olympics, games of the XXXII Olympiad, rescheduled in 2021 after getting postponed due to COVID-19 pandemic ==See also== * Tokyo bid for the 2016 Summer Olympics * Tokyo Paralympics (disambiguation)
title: Tokyo Olympics
